subject: CBSNews.com News Alert! Sources Tell CBS Lone Gunman Took Own Life
body:
The FBI and the ATF believe two handguns were used by a lone gunman who took 
his own life after fatally shooting at least 30 people at Virginia Tech, 
sources tell CBS News.

Log on now to www.cbsnews.com, or wap.cbsnews.com for wireless users, for details. 

Wireless photo and video alerts from CBSNews.com, direct to your phone. Subscribe now at http://www.cbsnews.com/htdocs/wireless/index.php.
